0.title: Pilot

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

0.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Epic Election

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

1.plot: Trying to impress Kelly and show he's more than just little freshman, Bucket gets caught in a lie and announces he's running against Aloe for school President.

2.title: Epic Girls

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

2.plot: Aloe is hosting the party of the year, open to any girl and only a few select guys. Determined to take part, Bucket and Skinner dress up as girls and sneak in.

3.title: Epic Jobs

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

3.plot: Bucket and Skinner get jobs at the taco shop to pay for repairs to the dive boat. Though Bucket takes his job seriously Skinner just wants to eat tacos.

4.title: Epic Brains

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

4.plot: After a paperwork mix up the guys are selected to be part of the school's gifted program. While they love the perk of getting out of school early, they are soon in over their heads when they are assigned a difficult assignment.

5.title: Epic Dancer

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

5.plot: Bucket is jealous when he learns that Kelly is going to the school dance with a senior he thinks is a jerk. As he and Skinner try to sabotage her date, they start to wonder if he's not as bad as they thought.

6.title: Epic Musical

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

6.plot: Kelly is cast as the lead in the school musical, and when Bucket learns that she has a kissing scene he auditions for the play. But Bucket doesn't take it well when Aloe swoops in and steals Bucket's role.

7.title: Epic Rock Star

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

7.plot: Musician, Sara Bareilles, returns to her home town of Pacific Bluffs to hold a song writing contest. The winning song will be featured on Sara's next album. Bucket & Skinner enter the contest and win!

8.title: Epic Escape

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

8.plot: When Skinner lands in Saturday detention, Bucket tries to get himself put in too, so the pair can break out together and surf the weekend's monster swells.

9.title: Epic Wingman

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

9.plot: Aloe talks Bucket into being his wingman on a double date with two seniors, but the partnership quickly turns into a battle of wills as the guys try to one-up each other to impress the girls.

10.title: Epic Babysitters

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

10.plot: Kelly has won concert tickets and offers to take Bucket & Skinner, under the condition they babysit for Piper. The boys agree to babysit but quickly realize this job is way more than they bargained for.

11.title: Epic Bobo

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

11.plot: Aloe offers Bucket a spot on the varsity surf team, but in exchange he wants to borrow Bobo, Three Piece's prized surfboard. After Aloe accidentally breaks Bobo, Bucket along with the guys, must get rid of the evidence.

12.title: Epic Takeover

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

12.plot: While watching the surf shop Bucket causes the lease to lapse. Aloe quickly swoops in and takes over the space for his own store, and the only way Bucket and Skinner can get the shop back is through a surf competition.

13.title: Epic Dates

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

13.plot: The boys are feeling down since Skinner has an ear infection preventing him from surfing, and Bucket is annoyed that Blake & Kelly's relationship is going so well.

14.title: Epic Cuffs

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

14.plot: Talent show rehearsal for their magic act goes awry when Bucket and Skinner accidentally handcuff themselves to Kelly. Unable to free themselves, the three do their best to make it through Kelly's stuffy dinner party.

15.title: Epic Crashers

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

15.plot: Skinner falls for a rich heiress after the boys sneak into an elite yacht club, and while Bucket helps him act wealthy and cultured so she doesn't learn the truth about him, Aloe is determined to expose Skinner.

16.title: Epic Haunting

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

16.plot: Bucket and Skinner's latest plan to achieve epic status requires them to spend the whole night in the town's legendary haunted house.

17.title: Epic Breakup, Part 1

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

17.plot: After Bucket is disappointed that Kelly is going to prom with Blake, Skinner cheers up his friend with tickets to the rock festival. Piper destroys Kelly's expensive prom dress, and devises a way to get herself and Three Pieces on a TV game show.

18.title: Epic Breakup, Part 2

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

18.plot: Bucket and Skinner head to a rock festival on the wrong bus and accidentally enter a military facility. Elsewhere, Kelly's prom plans go astray when her old childhood pal shows up and Piper ruins her dress.

19.title: Epic Christmas

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

19.plot: It's Christmas Eve and Bucket is depressed that his family's annual Christmas trip to the mountains has been canceled. Despite Skinner's efforts to raise his best friend's spirits, Bucket wants nothing to do with the holidays.

20.title: Epic Crush

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

20.plot: Bucket recognizes the pretty new girl, Leslie, as the crazy girl from summer camp who stalked him. While Leslie claims she's doesn't know Bucket, he's convinced she's at his school to get back at him.

21.title: Epic Copycat

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

21.plot: Winter formal is coming up and when the most popular girl in Bucket's class, Danielle, breaks up with her boyfriend Bucket decides to ask her to the dance.

22.title: Epic Chicken

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

22.plot: Bucket's crippling fear of chickens embarrasses him when one gets loose at school and he totally loses his cool in front of Kelley. In an attempt to prove he isn't a wimp, he and Skinner stage a fake robbery at the surf shop.

23.title: Epic Cheer

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

23.plot: Bucket and Skinner join Kelly's cheerleading squad when they learn the team is competing for a trip to Regionals in Hawaii. But when they accidentally get most of the squad sick they must convince rival Aloe to help and fill in

24.title: Epic Cupids

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

24.plot: The school's P.E. teacher, Coach Briggs has broken up with her boyfriend and is taking her unhappiness out on her students by turning gym class into boot camp.

25.title: Epic Showdown

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

25.plot: Piper teaches Bucket and Skinner martial arts, and makes them think they are better than they actually are. But after the now-confident guys accept a challenge to fight the school bully, Piper and Kelly must set them straight.

26.title: Epic Seal

episode of.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures (TV Series 2011–2013)

26.plot: Bucket and Skinner accidentally lose the school's seal mascot, and enlist the help of Skinner's animal-loving cousin Patty, a blogger visiting from Australia who is excited to record the missing-animal drama for her web series.

imdb.title: Bucket and Skinner's Epic Adventures
plot: The series follows two friends from the fictional California town of Pacific Bluffs. Often, the boys act quite sporadically leading them to multiple conflicts.::Anonymous
